summary:
My fifth dagger
A very cool shanker with 2048 HD textures~~~~~~

Stop updating separated version,Please download the DaggerCraftPackage
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]-=DAGGERCRAFT=-[/color]

[color=red]ENDORSE IT, IF YOU LIKE IT! THANK YOU! [/color]


  [color=red]Stop updating separated version
Please download the daggercraftpackage [/color]
---------------------------------------------
  [color=yellow]DaggerCraftPackage[/color][color=red] is released!! 
You can download HERE:[/color]
 [color=yellow]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6494[/color]
---------------------------------------------




My fifth dagger
A very cool shanker with 2048 HD textures~~

First released at http://game.ali213.net/thread-3875902-1-1.html

There are a lot of one-handed weapons mods and two-handed weapons mods, but the little dagger mods. I do love daggers, so I made some dagger mods for owe use.

I hope you like it!!!

U Can build it in the deadric smithing list.
Or using Console command :
player.additem xx444444 1 (xx is the load order num of the mod)

Free to improve it with grindstones and enchant it!!

The base damage is 13 (blade of woe is 12,deadric dagger is 11)
When created with 100 smithing and you have 100 one-handed, the damage will be 39

---------------------
NOTE:
---------------------
It\'s named \"XIV`s Bloody Shanker\",cuz I made it for myself ```
If you don`t like it ,you can use the esp in the \"rename.rar\" to replace the esp in main file,the name will be \"Bloody Shanker\",instead of the original
---------------------
I recommend another dagger mods:

shard of azzinoth
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4683[/color]

dagger of time
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5379[/color]

mutilator:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6063[/color]

death sting:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6163[/color]

---------------------
Lastest Version:
---------------------
v0.2
a little fix of model ,about back of knife

---------------------
Installation:
---------------------

Extract to skyrim\\data\\
and enable the ESP in SkyrimLauncher or NMM
author: faxivcm
